TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit Notification/MessagingStyle extends Android.App.Notification/Style

Docs.summary: Helper class for generating large-format notifications that include multiple back-and-forth messages of varying types between any number of people.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Android.App.Person user) cil managed

Docs.param: Required - The person displayed for any messages that are sent by the user. Any messages added with #addMessage(Notification.MessagingStyle.Message) who don't have a Person associated with it will be displayed as if they were sent by this user. The user also needs to have a valid name associated with it, which is enforced starting in Android android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES#P.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class Java.Lang.ICharSequence userDisplayName) cil managed

Docs.param: Required - the name to be displayed for any replies sent by the user before the posting app reposts the notification with those messages after they've been actually sent and in previous messages sent by the user added in #addMessage(Notification.MessagingStyle.Message)

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
